channel.title: CVE Feed for Live Composer Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Live Composer Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-52206|2024-09-04T15:34:37.566Z -- live%20composer%20team -- page%20builder%3A%20live%20composer
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Live Composer Team Page Builder: Live Composer live-composer-page-builder.This issue affects Page Builder: Live Composer: from n/a through 1.5.25.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Live Composer Team Page Builder: Live Composer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Page Builder: Live Composer: from n/a through 1.5.42.
